definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: This regular meeting has been sublated.
Author successfully treated 486 cases of lateral episiotomy with catgut encatarrhaphy.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了486例會陰側切後用羊腸線埋縫的方法。

sentences.english: Strict implementation of the construction side of the regular meeting with the system.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格執行與施工方的日例會制度。

sentences.english: Ensuring the shift is reviewed and hand-over and briefings are carried out.
sentences.chinese: 確保每個班次的回顧交接班及例會的召開。

sentences.english: We meet at least twice each week at the Faculty association meetings.
sentences.chinese: 在每星期的教師協會例會上，我們至少有兩次的碰面。

sentences.english: Conduct pre-shift meeting with staff and review all information pertinent to the day's business.
sentences.chinese: 每天負責開班前例會，回顧任何與營業有關的信息。

sentences.english: Let"s hold a regular meeting every month."
sentences.chinese: 我們每個月都要開例會。

sentences.english: Communicate regularly with outlet managers and conduct effective daily briefings and weekly meetings.
sentences.chinese: 和餐飲部部門經理保持有效的溝通，組織例會和週會。

sentences.english: This was, she said, a weekly meeting at a colleague’s house.
sentences.chinese: 她指的是在她一個同事家裏舉辦的每週例會。

sentences.english: The regular meeting will take place the next quater, any questions?
sentences.chinese: 例會將在下季度續會，你們還有什麼意見嗎？

sentences.english: Usually they hold a meeting to arrange the week's tasks every Monday.
sentences.chinese: 依照向例，他們每週一召開例會佈置一週的工作。

sentences.english: General Meeting of the Department of the Internal Medicine, Sakura Medical Center, Toho University.
sentences.chinese: 東邦大學醫學部佐倉病院內科學講座例會。

sentences.english: The two of you can catch up on things outside of weekly staff meetings.
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個可以在外面就每週員工例會的事聊一聊天。

sentences.english: By the end of the session, virtually my entire program had passed.
sentences.chinese: 到議會例會結束之時，我的全部計劃都獲得通過。

sentences.english: Regular meetings are held between section Presidents and members of PCOM.
sentences.chinese: 分會主席將與PCOM成員之間定期舉行例會。
